name: The Wayward
description: Located in the Perry Lane Hotel

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Plays great. Messy bounceover from slot machine, so just dropcatch and shoot the left ramp if you have to bail.

machine_conditions.comment: Plays great. Messy bounceover from slot machine, so just dropcatch and shoot the left ramp if you have to bail.

location_machine_xrefs.condition: Play field is dirty (black rubbers). Game seems dark, which may be lights or may just be the ambiance. Sound is turned all the way down which is unfortunate for a game where the sound and call outs are the best part. Not sure if the Creature holo actually works or not.
